feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Create UserCreationService and use in API V1 create user endpoint by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19150
  • fix: HubSpot doesn't work for paid team events. by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19298
  • fix: timezone input text is now visible in dark mode by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19325
  • feat: make first tab active by default by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19315
  • perf: Use one PageWrapper instance for all settings pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18752
  • fix: Can't use unsaved booking question as variable in event name by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18604
  • chore: remove WithLayout from not-found route by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19331
  • fix: redirect logic in /settings/admin/apps route by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19332
  • chore: v3 fixed filters, new profile view by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19312
  • fix: Issues with date changes in column view by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19258
  • chore: fixed tooltip position for routing form by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19267
  • fix: Fairness when routing by @emrysal & @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18550
  • fix: blank add guest input, location and request reschedule glitch by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19335

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.1...v5.0.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: empty hosts array in filterHostsByLeadThreshold by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19343
  • fix: Plain Chat loading in embed by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19348
  • fix: tanstack getRight error, focus in user impersonation, missing space after input fields, border in my-profile email by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19350
  • fix: Test preview - Routing forms crash for regular teams(that are not sub-teams) by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19353
  • fix: Show loading indicator in button when delete account API is in progress by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19361
  • fix: Dont crash entire listing if one form has faulty JSON fields by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19368
  • feat: Duration select dropdown multiple durations email embed by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17432
  • chore: deprecate requiresLicense = true by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19374
  • fix(ui): prevent text descender cutoff in user dropdown by @ddoemonn in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19309
  • feat: added millis ai - low latency voice scheduling AI by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19357
  • fix: Improved EventsLimit page for mobile viewports by @harshit078 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19270
  • feat: Add 'Monobot CX' web application into cal.com app-store by @yuriisilkov1986 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18505
  • docs: Mintlify help updates by @mintlify in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19084
  • fix: Intercom app - book an event inside the messenger by @vachmara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19391

New Contributors

  • @ddoemonn made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19309
  • @harshit078 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19270
  • @yuriisilkov1986 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18505

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.2...v5.0.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: impersonation button alignment by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19383
  • chore: Salesforce - Added logs more by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19397
  • fix: phone input crash for platform by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19396
  • fix: Dry Run improvements - Slot reservation by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18865
  • fix: multiselect is broken by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19351
  • fix: reduce abnormal spacing in calendar invite by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19290
  • feat: implement mintlify AI search into CMD+K by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18749
  • chore: remove /user & /user/type dynamic routes from middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19345
  • fix: fix youtube link and referral url by @yuriisilkov1986 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19410
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19417
  • chore: remove org/team booking routes from middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19349
  • fix: Issues with scheduling timezone change without end time by @nayan-bagale in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19103
  • chore: Block POST requests to all page routes except a whitelist by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19346

New Contributors

  • @nayan-bagale made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19103

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.3...v5.0.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Routing Form - Crash due to an invalid state of connected field that was deleted in main form by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19421
  • fix: #19296 Success pages shows wrong nr of occurrences (recurring booking) by @PAVANNAIK25 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19304
  • fix: preserve columnVisibility from initialState by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19412
  • feat: v2 routing forms responses endpoints by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19319
  • fix: typos in packages/features by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19220
  • fix: Tabs activation issue and refactor by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19399
  • feat: display alert when leaving/reloading booking page by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18932
  • fix: booking fields being overridden whenever saving with atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19339
  • refactor: Enabling typescript 5.3.3 in @calcom/trpc by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19394
  • fix: skip confirm step followup by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19076
  • chore: remove deprecated code, Meta & MetaProvider by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19407
  • docs: add help section for creating phone only event type by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19440
  • chore: More salesforce logs by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19409
  • fix: typos in packages/ui by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19434
  • fix: Issues in custom event name by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19405

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.4...v5.0.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: block POST requests to invalid routes in middleware intentionally by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19446
  • feat: enable_pip_ui in dailyvideo by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19423
  • perf: do not use dynamic imports for settings layouts by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19461
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19462
  • fix: FAB size by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19466
  • fix: Revert "fix: FAB size" by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19467
  • Upgrade dub version by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19472
  • fix: FAB size by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19469
  • perf: move all booking pages into (booking-page-wrapper) route group by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19321
  • fix: Username input field not in line by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19480
  • chore: new license purchase link by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19363
  • fix: Misaligned Select with input box by @harshit078 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19400
  • fix: Wrong avatars shown in webhooks page by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19386
  • feat(lexicalEditor): custom enter-key plugin by @SySagar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15952
  • fix: display error msg when end date not selected by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19485
  • fix: typos in packages/app-store by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19470
  • feat: extract bottom navigation logic into a custom hook by @ddoemonn in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19468
  • revert: default people filter at bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19486
  • chore: cleanup - Remove WithLayout HoC itself by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19490
  • fix: Some errors breaking storybook build by @cnhhoang850 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18767
  • chore: bump alby packages by @rolznz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18406
  • fix: typos in several package/ directories by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19495
  • chore: replace toaster with sonner by @nayan-bagale in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19342
  • chore: .env.example by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19364
  • chore: removed experimental calcom license api call by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19366
  • fix: /bookings get handler by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19369
  • fix: replace filter implementations on bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19445
  • fix: Fix for 'Scheduling by cal.com' is still showing in workflow emails even when branding is disabled by @sn10-debug in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18862
  • perf: improve matching paths in middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19491
  • revert: "fix: replace filter implementations on bookings (#19445)" by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19506
  • fix: consider sendToAll settings in routingForms response by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18226

New Contributors

  • @sn10-debug made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18862

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.5...v5.0.6
